rules_text:
[i]Brand of Naga[/i] – Whenever a creature you control attacks a player alone, it gains your choice of lifelink or flying until end of turn.
[i]Gentle Heart[/i] – Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
Partner with Chrom, Sword of Ylisse [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Chrom into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
